module.name: terminal
module.required: Depended on by other required modules.

interface.name: term_pty
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a pty type.

param.name: pty_type
param.summary: An object type that will applied to a pty.

interface.name: term_user_pty
interface.summary: Transform specified type into an user pty type. This allows it to be relabeled via type change by login programs such as ssh.

param.name: userdomain
param.summary: The type of the user domain associated with this pty.

param.name: object_type
param.summary: An object type that will applied to a pty.

interface.name: term_login_pty
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a pty type used by login programs, such as sshd.

param.name: pty_type
param.summary: An object type that will applied to a pty.

interface.name: term_tty
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a tty type.

param.name: tty_type
param.summary: An object type that will applied to a tty.

interface.name: term_user_tty
interface.summary: Transform specified type into a user tty type.

param.name: domain
param.summary: User domain that is related to this tty.

param.name: tty_type
param.summary: An object type that will applied to a tty.

interface.name: term_create_pty
interface.summary: Create a pty in the /dev/pts directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process creating the pty.

interface.name: term_use_all_terms
interface.summary: Read and write the console, all ttys and all ptys.

interface.name: term_write_console
interface.summary: Write to the console.

interface.name: term_read_console
interface.summary: Read from the console.

interface.name: term_use_console
interface.summary: Read from and write to the console.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_console
interface.summary: Do not audit attemtps to read from or write to the console.

interface.name: term_setattr_console
interface.summary: Set the attributes of the console device node.

interface.name: term_create_console_dev
interface.summary: Create the console device (/dev/console).

interface.name: term_getattr_pty_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of a pty filesystem

interface.name: term_dontaudit_getattr_pty_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of the /dev/pts directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_search_ptys
interface.summary: Search the contents of the /dev/pts directory.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_search_ptys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the contents of the /dev/pts directory.

interface.name: term_list_ptys
interface.summary: Read the /dev/pts directory to list all ptys.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_list_ptys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read the /dev/pts directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_manage_pty_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to create, read, write, or delete the /dev/pts directory.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_ioctl_generic_ptys
interface.summary: ioctl of generic pty devices.

interface.name: term_setattr_generic_ptys
interface.summary: Allow setting the attributes of generic pty devices.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_setattr_generic_ptys
interface.summary: Dontaudit setting the attributes of generic pty devices.

interface.name: term_use_generic_ptys
interface.summary: Read and write the generic pty type. This is generally only used in the targeted policy.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_generic_ptys
interface.summary: Dot not audit attempts to read and write the generic pty type. This is generally only used in the targeted policy.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_use_controlling_term
interface.summary: Read and write the controlling terminal (/dev/tty).

interface.name: term_use_ptmx
interface.summary: Read and write the pty multiplexor (/dev/ptmx).

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to allow access.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_ptmx
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write the pty multiplexor (/dev/ptmx).

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_getattr_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all user pty device nodes.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_getattr_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of any user pty device nodes.

interface.name: term_setattr_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Set the attributes of all user pty device nodes.

interface.name: term_relabelto_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Relabel to all user ptys.

interface.name: term_use_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Read and write all user ptys.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read any user ptys.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_relabel_all_user_ptys
interface.summary: Relabel from and to all user user pty device nodes.

interface.name: term_getattr_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all unallocated tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_getattr_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all unallocated tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_setattr_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Set the attributes of all unallocated tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_setattr_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to set the attributes of unallocated tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_ioctl_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to ioctl unallocated tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_relabel_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Relabel from and to the unallocated tty type.

interface.name: term_reset_tty_labels
interface.summary: Relabel from all user tty types to the unallocated tty type.

interface.name: term_append_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Append to unallocated ttys.

interface.name: term_write_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Write to unallocated ttys.

interface.name: term_use_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Read and write unallocated ttys.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_unallocated_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write unallocated ttys.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

interface.name: term_getattr_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all user tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_getattr_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of any user tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_setattr_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Set the attributes of all user tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_relabel_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Relabel from and to all user user tty device nodes.

interface.name: term_write_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Write to all user ttys.

interface.name: term_use_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Read and write all user to all user ttys.

interface.name: term_dontaudit_use_all_user_ttys
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write any user ttys.
